column4: Hello! I currently installed Ubuntu on my Dell xps 1530, and I'vr noticed something about the battery life, it went from 4.5 h (in windows) to 2.5h (in ubuntu). Find this pretty weird :S
are you going by the estimate, or how long it actually lasted
: About the battery, does your battery meter say 0% altough your computer is still going?
i never let it get that low so not sure
